metadata.synopsis: A player can try to talk to a waveservant that transfers items from offerings chest to Offerings Vault.She's not talkative, but with enough persuasion she can tell what's her task.
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1. Launch CTY_Main_A2. Talk to a waveservant that is in patrol between Water Queen's House and Offerings Vault in the cellarChest:goto -257.555; 5.502; -235.268

0.speaker: Untaken Fitzy Relma
0.text: Can't chat. These offerings need to be stowed before the next tide or there'll be Allandra to pay.

1.speaker: Untaken Fitzy Relma
1.text: There's two things I fear: Umberlee and Allandra. You're neither of those, so shoo.
